name: demographic_balance_by_canton
title: Demographic balance by canton
description: Annual data on the population, the live births, the deaths, the migrations, the inter-cantonal departures and arrivals, the acquisitions of Swiss citizenship by canton since 1980.
description_en: Annual data on the population, the live births, the deaths, the migrations, the inter-cantonal departures and arrivals, the acquisitions of Swiss citizenship by canton since 1980. Acquisition of swiss citizenship does not count affect population change.
